hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Install dependencies sudo zypper update -y cat /etc/os* sudo zypper install -y git gcc gcc-c++ make cmake bison ncurses-devel wget tar net-tools
# Install MySQL cd $WORK git clone git://github.com/mysql/mysql-server.git cd mysql-server git checkout tags/mysql-5.7.21
wget http://sourceforge.net/projects/boost/files/boost/1.59.0/boost_1_59_0.tar.gz tar xzf boost_1_59_0.tar.gz cmake . -DDOWNLOAD_BOOST=1 -DWITH_BOOST=. gmake
# Execute test cases gmake test sudo gmake install
# Post installation setup if !(getent passwd mysql); then sudo /usr/sbin/useradd mysql sudo /usr/sbin/groupadd mysql fi cd /usr/local/mysql sudo chown -R mysql . sudo chgrp -R mysql .
nohup sudo bin/mysqld --initialize --user=mysql & sudo /usr/local/mysql/bin/mysqld_safe --user=mysql & sleep 20s /usr/local/mysql/bin/mysqladmin --version --password=grep 'root@localhost:' /home/test/nohup.out | sed 's/^.*: //'
